PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymer has a broad absorption band in the range of 500-1100 nm with a tail extending to 1.3 μm.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption band |
| range of 500-1100 nm |
| tail |
| extending to 1.3 μm |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption band |
| range |
| 500-1100 nm |
| tail |
| extending |
| 1.3 μm |

Note: "absorption band" is considered a material property as it refers to a characteristic feature of the polymer material. "Range" is a property that describes the span of the absorption band. The other entities are descriptive terms that do not clearly refer to material properties.
